modName: Overlord OST for Skyrim Combat Sequences - DELETED
summary: This pack contains files with the music from Overlord (Anime Season 1 & 2) to remplace Skyrim original combat music.
descriptionHtml:
If you are an Overlord fan and love it's music, then this is the mod for you.
This little pack contanis music from Overlord battle scenes and remplace the original soundtrack of Skyrim battle sequences:

[color=#ffff00]Pack Content:[/color]

[color=#ff0000][size=3][b]* NORMAL COMBAT SEQUENCE *[/b][/size][/color]

﻿[color=#ff7700][b][i]- "Clash" (Season 1)[/i][/b][/color]

[center][youtube]05Zaunr6A-U[/youtube][/center] [i][b][color=#ff7700]﻿- "[/color][/b][/i][color=#ff7700][i][b]Twin swords that cut through the death" (Season 1)[/b][/i]
[/color]
[center]﻿[youtube]rFBU1Wozdro[/youtube][/center]

[color=#ff7700][b][i]﻿- "Fight for Justice" (Season 2)

[center][youtube]jOzLBePVXG8[/youtube]﻿[/center][/i][/b][/color]

[b][i][color=#ff7700]﻿- "There is no Defeat for Us" (Season 2)

[center]﻿[youtube]VDgn82xyA-4[/youtube][/center][/color][/i][/b]

[color=#ff0000][size=3][b]* BOSS COMBAT SEQUENCE *

[/b][/size][/color] [b][i][color=#ff7700]﻿- "NPC Battle" (Season 1)
[/color][/i][/b]
[center][youtube]BHpeFBH9EPA[/youtube]﻿[/center]

[b][i][color=#ff7700]﻿- "Jet-Black Hero VS Great Devil" (Season 2)
[/color][/i][/b]
[center][youtube]WRG1TISURBU[/youtube]﻿[/center]

[b][i][color=#ff7700]﻿- "I'am Ainz Ooal Gown" (Season 1)
[/color][/i][/b]
[center][youtube]AHX2lAHyfYo[/youtube]﻿[/center]
[b][i][color=#ffff00][size=3]<< INSTALATION >>[/size][/color]
[/i][/b]
﻿1.- Drop the "Data" folder on your Skyrim
﻿2.- Run Skyrim
﻿3.- Find enemies and fight.
﻿4.- Enjoy. (obviously)

[b][i][color=#ffff00][size=3]<< FUTURE Skyrim/Overlord PROJECTS >>
[/size][/color][/i][/b]
﻿- Town
﻿- Tabern
﻿- Wild (Out)
author: ZeroHunter13PC
